snippet: After saying at a news conference last week that the Rolling Stones would head into a recording studio this month “to just bat some ideas around,” the guitarist Ronnie Wood has amended those comments.
abstract: Rolling Stones guitarist Ronnie Wood amends his original announcement that the band would be heading into a recording studio to work on some new tunes, saying that no plans had been set.
lead_paragraph: After saying at a news conference last week that the Rolling Stones would head into a recording studio this month “to just bat some ideas around,” the guitarist Ronnie Wood has amended those comments.

headline.main: Stones to Record? Not So Fast
headline.print_headline: Stones to Record? Not So Fast
